Name Type Description
mObj MobiusDataObject Object to be rotated
xAxis float Angle (in Radians) about x-axis
yAxis float Angle (in Radians) about y-axis
zAxis float Angle (in Radians) about z-axis

Returns:
Null

scaleObject(mObj, scaleX, scaleY, scaleZ)

Scales the object along different axes
Parameters:
Name Type Description
mObj MobiusDataObject Object to be scaled
scaleX float Scaling-factor along the x-direction; Should be set to '1' if no scaling is required.
scaleY float Scaling-factor along the y-direction; Should be set to '1' if no scaling is required.
scaleZ float Scaling-factor along the z-direction; Should be set to '1' if no scaling is required.
